menu.description: Marinated cottage cheese cubes grilled to perfection, served with mint chutney.
Fragrant rice cooked with mixed vegetables and aromatic spices, served with raita.
Deep-fried milk dumplings soaked in rose-flavored syrup, garnished with pistachios.
Yogurt-based drink blended with ripe mangoes and a hint of cardamom.
Fragrant basmati rice cooked with succulent chicken and aromatic spices, served with raita.
Assorted fritters made with vegetables and chickpea flour, served with mint sauce.
Potato patties spiced with herbs and served with yogurt and chutneys.
Tender pieces of mutton cooked in a flavorful tomato and yogurt gravy.
Sweet carrot pudding garnished with nuts and cardamom.
Traditional Indian yogurt drink, available in sweet or salty variations.
Creamy rice pudding garnished with nuts and saffron, served chilled.
Traditional spiced tea with milk and honey, perfect for a cozy sip.
